body: So as you guys know, Black Friday is fast approaching. You guys gonna go and see if you can snag any cool deals? Bearing in mind you have to get up quite early. And alongside, do you have a set budget? For me, I have up to 500.
body_tagged: So as you guys know, Black Friday is fast approaching. You guys gonna go and see if you can snag any cool deals? Bearing in mind you have to get up quite early. And alongside, do you have a set budget? For me, I have up to 500.
title: Black Friday Deals?

replies.body:
I have a set budget of $1000, but I'm not going out on Black Friday this year...
Why?
Because I pay bills, rent, food, and any other necessity that is needed to live.
Other than that... I think you should wait for Cyber Monday if electronics is what your looking for.

Edit: If I have the patience and time... I probably go for an XBONE.
